memberdef.argsstring: (nfs_arg_t *parg, exportlist_t *pexport, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_inode_client_t *pclient, hash_table_t *ht, struct svc_req *preq, nfs_res_t *pres)
memberdef.name: nfs4_Compound

detaileddescription.para: Implements the NFS PROC4 COMPOUND. This routine processes the content of the nfsv4 operation list and composes the result. On this aspect it is a little similar to a dispatch routine. Operation and functions necessary to process them are defined in array optab4 .

parameterdescription.para: [IN] context for the FSAL (unused but kept for nfs functions prototype homogeneity)

xrefdescription.para: BUGAZOMEU: Reminder: Stats on NFSv4 operations are to be set here

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_Compound_Free: Mem_Free the result for NFS4PROC_COMPOUND
compound_data_Free: Mem_Frees the compound data structure.

briefdescription.para: Routines used for managing the NFS4 COMPOUND functions.

detaileddescription.para:
